pr_title: add list item to play video on kodi

timeline.message:
add list item to play video on kodi

closes: #5157

timeline.bodyText: You could provide this as a method in KoreUtil so if the logic for when to show the kodi entry is centralized and not copied over 3 places.
timeline.author: XiangRongLin

timeline.bodyText: This method can be also used in other places, e.g. in the player, can't it?
timeline.author: Stypox

replies.bodyText: this seems like a reasonable place to use the new method, but i couldn't find a way to get a StreamInfoItem from a playQueue. any suggestions?
replies.author: khimaros

replies.bodyText: @khimaros Instead of passing in a StreamInfoItem you can pass in the service id, since that is the thing you actually need. Otherwise those items should have a common superclass, that would work too, but just passing the id is preferred.

timeline.message: pass serviceId instead of item, reduce duplication
